survey_name: Online Freelance Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from freelancers using online platforms to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which online freelance platform do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field to capture platforms not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice dropdown with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input field.

script.question_text: Which online freelance platform do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the platform's user interface and ease of navigation?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistent measurement of satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the platform's user interface and ease of navigation?

questions.question_text: What types of projects do you typically work on through this platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse project types.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input field.

script.question_text: What types of projects do you typically work on through this platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using this platform?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique challenges not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection with an 'Other' option that triggers a text input field.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using this platform?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to other freelancers?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question to gauge overall satisfaction.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to other freelancers?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience on this platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for actionable insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience on this platform?
